EmailTemplate.subject: New Year- New Wifi
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Are you frustrated by poor internet connection while flying? We understand the importance for our government and military customers to have seamless Wi-Fi from take off to landing. GoDirect Airtime provides a global connection to meet your requirements, with simple installation and the ability to manage your costs and bandwidth on-board. Book an appointment with our sales team today to learn more about our custom-made packages.
